name: Un mariage d'enfer
description:
This is heavily inspired by FAITH from Airdorf I really like the style of his retro games and since this was kinda like my own personnal game jam I wanted to try something. 
Omious song in the background: https://opengameart.org/content/evil-temple-ambiance-loop

Cheers: https://opengameart.org/content/applause-in-a-large-hall-or-church
